about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Discover the story and mission of Simple Decor

story.description1: Simple Decor was founded with the vision of creating products from natural materials, bringing aesthetic and practical value to modern life.
story.description2: We believe that minimalist design is not just a trend but a sustainable way of living, respecting nature and creating meaningful products.
story.description3: From the early days with a small workshop, we have now developed into an export business serving customers worldwide.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.subtitle: The journey of Simple Decor
ourStory.storyParagraph1: Simple Decor began as a small family workshop with a vision to create beautiful, sustainable home decor products.
ourStory.storyParagraph2: Over the years, we've grown into a trusted partner for businesses worldwide, maintaining our commitment to quality and sustainability.
ourStory.storyParagraph3: Today, we continue to innovate while staying true to our core values of craftsmanship and environmental responsibility.
